import axios from'axios';export var sendDelete=function sendDelete(userId,OrderType){var baseUrl="http://localhost:4000/orders"+OrderType+"/delete/"+userId;axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(response){if(response.data.success){alert(response.data.message);}}).catch(function(error){alert("Error on delete item");});};export var sendCreate=function sendCreate(orderdate,Category,Products,Status,Comment,qte,pss,OrderType){// url de backend
var baseUrl="http://localhost:4000/orders"+OrderType+"/create";// parameter data post
if(OrderType=="Produit"){var datapost={Orderdate:orderdate,Category:Category,Products:Products,Status:Status,Comment:Comment,qte:qte,volume:pss};axios.post(baseUrl,datapost).then(function(response){if(response.data.success){alert(response.data.message);}else{alert("Error when creating a new order ");}}).catch(function(error){alert(error);console.log(error);});}else{var _datapost={Orderdate:orderdate,Category:Category,Products:Products,Status:Status,Comment:Comment,qte:qte,pss:pss};axios.post(baseUrl,_datapost).then(function(response){if(response.data.success){alert(response.data.message);}else{alert("Error when creating a new order ");}}).catch(function(error){alert(error);console.log(error);});}};export var updateStatus=function updateStatus(orderid,OrderType){// url de backend
var baseUrl="http://localhost:4000/orders"+OrderType+"/updateStatus/"+orderid;// parameter data post
var datapost={Status:"WaitingValidation"};axios.post(baseUrl,datapost).then(function(response){if(response.data.success){alert(response.data.message);}else{alert("Error when updating status ");}}).catch(function(error){alert(error);console.log(error);});};export var sendUpdate=function sendUpdate(Orderdate,Category,Products,Status,Comment,qte,pss,orderid,OrderType){// url de backend
var baseUrl="http://localhost:4000/orders"+OrderType+"/update/"+orderid;// parameter data post
if(OrderType=="Produit"){var datapost={Orderdate:Orderdate,Category:Category,Products:Products,Status:Status,Comment:Comment,qte:qte,volume:pss};axios.post(baseUrl,datapost).then(function(response){if(response.data.success){alert(response.data.message);}else{alert("Error when updating data");}}).catch(function(error){alert(error);console.log(error);});}else{var _datapost2={Orderdate:Orderdate,Category:Category,Products:Products,Status:Status,Comment:Comment,qte:qte,pss:pss};axios.post(baseUrl,_datapost2).then(function(response){if(response.data.success){alert(response.data.message);}else{alert("Error when updating data");}}).catch(function(error){alert(error);console.log(error);});}};export var getCountNborders=function getCountNborders(){axios.get('http://localhost:4000/orders/countall').then(function(response){// handle success
return response.data.count;}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};export default{sendDelete:sendDelete,sendCreate:sendCreate};
